file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 30-20-00-06 - AIR INTAKES - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIR INTAKES - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the exhaust duct of the engine thermal anti-icing system. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 30-20-00-200-801-A ♦ EXHAUST DUCT - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 30-20-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-20-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EXHAUST DUCT - INSPECTION A. General (1) The get access to the exhaust duct you must open the lower cowling, remove the panel in the rear bulkhead, and remove the outlet grille. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine - Lower Cowling Door 423 RH Engine - Lower Cowling Door D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Mirror To inspect the duct available Commercially For the lighting of the region of the inspec- Flashlight available tion F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task RH/LH Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the panel located at the rear bulkhead. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 30-20-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Remove the outlet grille. J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Thermal Anti-Ice (TAI) Exhaust Duct for Condition and Security of Installation (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Examine the exhaust duct for leakage and security. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the outlet grille. (2) Install the panel located at the rear bulkhead. (3) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400).
